page.title: 15HEALTH Local Facilities
page.content: The village and the local area are served by two resident N.H.S. doctors. A daily surgery is held at premises attached to the home of one of the doctors.For any serious illness, accident, or injury patients must travel for treatment to hospitals in Boston, Lincoln or Grantham. A District Nurse visits the elderly people who require regular home attention of a less serious nature. A Health Visitor with responsibility for the under fives makes regular visits to the mothers and infants of the village. Children of school age are seen by the School Nurse, School Doctor and School Dentist for regular checks of hygiene, growth and development. The Manor is currently a home for the elderly and infirm, but is due for closure in the next few years.
